gaze at the striking scenery of a waterfall surrounded by diverse wildflowers while enjoying breakfast at the patio dining area open from 6am until 11am offering an extensive selection of meal options or an assortment of breakfast foods – do give their musthave orange blueberry pancake and starbucks coffee a try

ive visited three smashburgers throughout arizona and this particular location is definitely the top choice because of its consistent wellmade warm food although its somewhat pricey its worth it because the food is truly delicious
